Question
========

Suppose P(A~1~) + P(A~2~) =1 and P(B~1~ ) + P( B~2~) =1. Given P(A~1~) = 0.60, P(B~1~|A~1~) = 0.60, and P((B~2~|A~2~) = 0.50. What then is P(A~1~|B~1~)?

Answerlist
----------

* 0,30
* 0,36
* 0,60
* 0,64

Solution
========

Answerlist
----------

* 0.30: Incorrect
* 0.36: Incorrect
* 0.60: Incorrect
* 0.64: Correct
